Package guiScreens

Class MainScreen

java.lang.Object
guiScreens.MainScreen
public class MainScreen
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MainScreen​(ScreenManager incomingManager, GameInformation gameInfo, BasicGameLogic basicLogic)
    Creates the GUI screen.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void closeWindow()
    Closes the GUI setup window.
    void finishedWindow()
    Notifies the game environment that the screen must be closed.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MainScreen

      public MainScreen​(ScreenManager incomingManager, GameInformation gameInfo, BasicGameLogic basicLogic)
      Creates the GUI screen.
      Parameters:
      incomingManager - The ScreenManager object that will launch and close this screen.
      gameInfo - The logic class containing information about the current game.
      basicLogic - The logic class allowing farmland interaction and advancing of days.

  • Method Details

    • closeWindow

      public void closeWindow()
      Closes the GUI setup window. Called from the game environment.

    • finishedWindow

      public void finishedWindow()
      Notifies the game environment that the screen must be closed.
